exp_p1 = np.array([610, 190])
exp_p2 = np.array([[610, 890], [1310, 890], [1310, 190]])
pix_p1 = self.cam.get_pixel_coords_for_vertices(self.p1)
pix_p2 = self.cam.get_pixel_coords_for_vertices(np.array([self.p2, self.p3,
    self.p4]))
try:
    np.testing.assert_almost_equal(pix_p1, exp_p1)
    np.testing.assert_almost_equal(pix_p2, exp_p2)
    res = True
except AssertionError as err:
    res = False
    print(err)
self.assertTrue(res)
